name: Adam Kelly WARD, petitioner, v. TEXAS.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Adam Kelly WARD, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
attorneys: Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Adam Kelly WARD, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
No. 15-8589 (15A964).
Supreme Court of the United States
March 22, 2016.
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas denied.
